attributes.action: stop testing on animals by Procter and Gamble! And to display labels on consumable products that state whether it is tested on animals or not!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No more testing on animals! And can they clearly display the products that we are buying if they are tested on animals or not? They should and not let these people like Procter and Gamble get away with it!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
